response.overview: Hamoudi & Emil, two young boys, watch the girl of their dreams from a window. Through lotion-rubbing fantasies, lost footballs, borrowed lawnmowers, the large usage of a pair of binoculars, prayer to Mecca and an odd spot of air-rifle sniping, the two friends hatch numerous plots to convince the red-headed beauty that two twelve-year-old boys can be smooth characters enough to please her.
response.title: Hamoudi & Emil
